detailedSolution:
A rectangle whose length divided by the width is approximately equal to <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mo class="MJX-tex-mathit" mathvariant="italic">ϕ</mo>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\mathit{ϕ}</annotation></semantics></math> or 1.618.
